channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Pickleball is so last year. An ‘endless’ surf pool is the standout feature at this private club where units start at $2.5M
item.description: "People today want to get out in the world and be active and wake up the next morning and feel good and be able to do it again."

item.title: Private payrolls grew by 146,000 in November, less than expected, ADP says
item.description: Companies added 146,000 jobs on the month, below the downwardly revised 184,000 in October and less than the Dow Jones estimate for 163,000.

item.title: Amazon sued by DC attorney general for allegedly excluding neighborhoods from Prime delivery
item.description: Amazon's actions caused more than 48,000 Prime members to get slower delivery than the rest of the capital city, Attorney General Brian Schwalb claime...

item.title: ADP jobs report signals U.S. labor market in stable condition
Car sales jump to 3 1/2-year high. Is it a good time to buy?
Amtrak is riding high, notching an all-time record number of passengers in fiscal 2024
UnitedHealthcare executive Brian Thompson reportedly shot and killed in New York
Modern-day hippie moms have found solace in one Trump appointee: RFK Jr.
item.description: The crunchy-mom movement has intersected with RFK’s plans to overhaul the FDA.

item.title: Dow on track for record as investors await Powell comments — follow updates here
Roku will be bought for a large premium in the next year, says Needham analyst Laura Martin
item.description: Don't be surprised if Roku gets scooped up by a competitor in 2025, Needham said.

item.title: Trump considers replacing Pete Hegseth, his embattled secretary of defense pick, with Ron DeSantis
item.description: Trump's choice of Hegseth is now in jeopardy because of allegations of drinking and reports about his treatment of women.

item.title: Taco Bell will let you turn that taco run into a photoshoot with drive-thru photo booths
Influencers behind viral ‘Birds Aren’t Real’ phenomenon resurrect the defunct Enron brand and are using it to sell t-shirts
item.description: The original Enron collapsed 23 years ago.

item.title: Marvell’s stock skyrockets as it’s dubbed the next hot AI-chip name
Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: Salesforce, Foot Locker, Pure Storage, PSQ Holdings and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in early trading.
